channel.title: Is there a way to have the runserver be visible in a diff spot(PLEASE READ)
channel.description:
can you make it so that the runserver doesnt show up on the bottom bar but shows up in the other bar were the time is?
look at the pic for a diagram
http://img201.imageshack.us/my.php?image=12272007212512ac7.png
or if not is there a way to make it invisible totaly?

item.title: Is there a way to have the runserver be visible in a diff spot(PLEASE READ)
item.dc:creator: @gamerx.info gamerx.info
item.description:
@gamerx.info wrote:

no but i dont know why you would want to do that a compile takes 5 seconds on average. so it dosent make any sense BUT to really answer your question it is NOT possible unless there is a way to do it with exe’s .com files so no im not sure i only know .bat files but as a .bat file it is impossible but i suppose you can turn off the show alltogether but im not sure how
thanks

Read full topic
